item.title: Rising stocks and IPOs helped create 287 new billionaires this year
item.description: The U.S. led the global billionaire increase, with 92 new self-made billionaires representing wealth of $180 billion, according to UBS.

item.title: Inside Art Basel Miami: Beeple’s robot dogs
item.description: CNBC’s Robert Frank joins ‘Squawk on the Street’ from Miami to report on the latest project from the artist Beeple.

item.title: Inside Art Basel Miami 2025: Here's what to know
item.description: The art market is back after a three-year bear market. CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' from Miami with a look at what the wealthy are buying.

item.title: Asset-backed finance is growing fast and drawing new scrutiny
item.description: ABF involves lending against a specific asset, income stream, or loan rather than lending to a company based on its cash flow.

item.title: Why aspirational luxury shopping is losing steam — and what’s ahead in 2026
item.description: 2026 could be another year of winners and losers in luxury, J.P. Morgan says.
